channel.title: Runes
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Runes" - Ancient blueprints question

item.title: Re: Runes
item.content:encoded:
OKay thank you.So I guess getting the best will have to wait until season 3 then.

Thanks for teh reply!

item.title: Re: Runes
item.content:encoded: If it is the full crafted Runic Items you are reffering to, you can't, because no full crafted item is tradeable.

item.title: Re: Runes
item.content:encoded: Okay I knew that but I just wanted to make sure.But,one more thing.Will I be able to perhaps send the ingredients to someone I trust and that has got the ancient blueprints to make,and then he can send them back over?

item.title: Re: Runes
item.content:encoded: The special mission to obtain the Ancient Blueprints won't open up unless you're Season 3 or higher. So, no, you're out of luck until then.

item.title: Runes
item.content:encoded: Now,looking at the highest level dustcloaks,pistols,scythes etc. they all need a rune to be made.Now,I know I need the ancient blueprints for them,but the site tells me I need to be season 3+ to even be able to get the mission.So basically,will I be able to craft the highest-level scythes,pistols,dustcloaks and everything else?-As I am not season 3 yet!
